resources.string: If the location still fails after getting permission, please close the application and open it again to update the location again.
If there is no data, remove the widget and add a new one

This application only has a launcher widget, click the widget to update the weather immediately, usually automatically update once an hour, except from 0:00 to 6:00 in the morning.\nFollow-up upgrades of the application are in the freezeit module group: 781222669\nCoolapk&Github @JARK006
Please go to settings to enable location permission
Location SDK provided by Amap.com, weather data from \"Qweather.com\"
Please go to settings to enable notification permission
